name: Eureka
description:
Eureka is an open-world business management simulator. Start with a small crew and some basic supplies and turn your empty planet into a bustling beacon of industry.

Choose Your Products

Turn raw resources into any product you choose. Mine and refine gold. Turn trees into chairs. Cultivate crops. What you sell is up to you.

Manage Your Employees

Plan out construction, mining, manufacturing, and more, then assign workers to get it done. Efficiency is key.

Play the Market

Buy and sell goods from space-faring merchant ships while keeping an eye on the fluctuating galactic market. A shift in the economy might require a rethink of your business strategy.

Profit

Manage your crew efficiently, sell the right products at the right times, and make your millions!
